title: We're on the FCC Docket! Also HDHomerun certification update, new tuner box and more
description:
See more in this series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP  - Well over a thousand of you have posted comments so far to the FCC's docket in regards to the ATSC 3.0 DRM issue. We need to keep the pressure on to #savefreetv and convince the FCC that encryption should not be part of the transition to the new standard. Instructions for adding your comment here: https://lon.tv/fccinstructions -  Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:22 - Recap
01:12 - Petition Update
01:32 - FCC Docket Filings and info
04:58 - First "certified" tuner box
05:46 - HDHomerun Firmware Update
07:50 - Certification cost shuts out small companies / open source
09:05 - What local stations are saying
09:54 - Conclusion
